title: Organ donation rate in the United Kingdom 2018/19 , by country
yAxis: Rate of donation per million population
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is appeared to be the highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
The highest Country Wales has 12.8 more Rate of donation per million population than the lowest Country Scotland.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Rate of donation per million population in each Country on the y axis.
Country Wales has the highest Rate of donation per million population and Scotland has the lowest Rate of donation per million population.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is appeared to be the highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
The highest Country Wales has 12.8 more Rate of donation per million population than the lowest Country Scotland.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
The Rate of donation per million population of Country Wales is 1.72% larger than the minimum value at Scotland.
The Country Wales has the highest Rate of donation per million population, followed by , and Northern Ireland. Down to the Country Scotland which is the lowest.
The lowest value 17.9 at Scotland is almost 1.28 times smaller than the average value 24.03.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 96.1.
